nio/PostgresInsert.description: Inserts signal data into a postgres database/table

bulk_insert.title: Bulk Insert Incoming Signals
bulk_insert.description: insert signals individually or insert the whole incoming list in one insert

commit_all.title: Commit transactions
commit_all.description: hidden attribute that configures whether to commit valid transactions

creds.title: Credentials
creds.description: username and password for the host database

db_name.title: DB Name
db_name.description: name of the database on the host

host.title: Host
host.description: hostname of the database to connect to

port.title: Port
port.description: postgres port on the host to connect to

ssl_cert.title: SSL cert path
ssl_cert.description: if ssl_mode is 'verify-full' or 'verify-ca', this is the path to the cert file used to verify the server.

ssl_mode.title: SSL Option
ssl_mode.description: select the SSL behavior for transferring data.

table_name.title: Table Name
table_name.description: name of the table on the database to execute commands on.

default.description: Any list of signals, where the keys of the incoming data are column names, and the values are the values needing to be inserted into those names.
